original_text: They have lost connection with the head, from whom the whole body, supported and held together by its ligaments and sinews, grows as God causes it to grow.
korean_text: 머리를 붙들지 아니하는지라 온 몸이 머리로 말미암아 마디와 힘줄로 공급함을 받고 연합하여 하나님이 자라게 하시므로 자라느니라

sentences.original_text: They have lost connection with the head
supported and held together by its ligaments and sinews
grows as God causes it to grow
